title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 07 May 2009 - XWiki
content:
rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 00:02  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 00:04  
jvelociter left at 00:08 (Client Quit)  
rrodriguez left at 00:29 ()  
ChathuraPrabuddh joined #xwiki at 05:03  
sdumitriu left at 05:26 ("Leaving.")  
tharindu joined #xwiki at 06:13  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:22): Hai marta\_  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:47): hi ChathuraPrabuddh  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:47): how are you?  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:48): Fine. How u doing?:)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:49): I'm trying to understand the Template and Document Type Manager  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:52): Ludovic told me abt this document manager thing. But I'm not 100% clear abt this thing  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:53): this is mockups that he created http://incubator.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Mockups/DocumentTypeManager  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:54): do you know about the XWiki data model: classes, objects, templates, sheets?  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:54): ya I went through them.   
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:55): ok  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:55): According to this we can create any doc using the template haa  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:56): well, the thing is that right now it is not so easy to manage these  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:56): you have to go to the class editor and create a class  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:56): then you have to create by hand a template document  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:56): add an object of that class to it  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:56): ya  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:56): ad include a sheet  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:57): and then you have to write the sheet  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:57): and for that you need to know about the XWiki api  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:57): and for most users it's not easy  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:58): moreover, for each class you create, the actions are basically the same  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:58): ya  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:58): ah, and let's not forget that at some point you'll want to see and manage all objects with that class from your wiki  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:59): so you need to know how to right an hql query for them  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:59): pretty ugly :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 07:59): mm  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 07:59): so the idea is to provide a nice interface, and do all this stuff automatically for the user  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:00): since you need to do pretty much the same thing every time anyway  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:01): for example, for your survey app, you need to provide a nice UI to the user, so that he can create the surveys  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:01): he doesn't need no know a thing about api and hql  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:02): but this can be done so that it is generic, and can be reused for other apps  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:02): mm  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:03): to get more technical:  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:04): you basically need to take pieces of the class and object editor code, and put them together in a ui that looks like ludo's mockups  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:05): ahh haa  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:05): add the live grid he and others have been working on for managing all the objects  
mflorea joined #xwiki at 08:05  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:06): improve a bit the scripts we have for generating sheets  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:06): add some ajax on the top :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:06): ya I also feel that  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:07): so if we look at the first mockup  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:08): that is the part where you set up the document creation  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:08): basically, a document of a given type is a document that contains a certain type of objest and has a presentation sheet  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:09): ya  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:09): so there you say what kind of documet you want among the ones that are available (like BlogPost, or Survey, etc)  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:10): now for the space i'm not sure what it's supposed to mean here, probably you set the default space for the docs of this type  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:11): i'd have to ask ludo  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:11): marta how we define a new document type  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:12): I think for survey like thinks we need a common document type like question creating template haa  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:13): well, actually i think this is where you define it, in fact  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:13): yes  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:14): mockup 1 is the ui for defining the type  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:14): i see that the next one is setting the properties  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:15): and 3 is for setting ... the properties of the properties :)  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:15): you understand that if you are used to the class editor  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:16): ya I used that in doing the Todo tutorial :)  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:16): cool  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:16): there's a new one, btw  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:16): it was improved  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:18): i think it's available on the gsoc wiki  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:19): anyway  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:19): let's go through what the doc type manager has to do at every step  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:20): So when we gonna create new doc types in document type manager, application dynamically  generates relevant classes and sheets for that. am I correct   
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:20): yes  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:21): Its like automating the class editor wizard using reusability  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:21): precisely  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:23): So if we create a new document how we gonna use it to derive a new page using that template. I'm little bit confuse in this linking part.:-(  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:24): i'm not sure i understand what you are referring to  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:26): what do you mean by use it to derive a new page?  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:27): After creating the doc type is it normal like other process. Like just creating the doc in selected space  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:28): yes, you create a document in the selected space, and you will define a class in it  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:30): the xwiki class implementation is undergoing some important changes, i think the sheet will soon be defined in the class itself, not as an external document  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:31): nope. I mean this, If a user want to create a survey. He has to select a document type which we providing. am I right.  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:31): yes  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:31): but  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:31): So do we have to provide that interface  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:32): i'm not sure we're clear about one thing  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:32): the user creating the survey will not be using the doc type manager  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:33): you will be using the doc type manager (after you implement it, of course :) ) to generate all the ui for the survey app  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:33): http://lists.xwiki.org/pipermail/devs/2009-April/012588.html   
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:34): yes, i remember the message  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:35): :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:37): marta I can see only two figures of the mockups ludovic gave to me. Is there more...   
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:38): 2? not 3?  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:39): as far as i know, that's all there is related to the doc type manager  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:39): sorry 3  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:39): and only ludovic knows exactly what he wants with it  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:39): all the rest of us can do is tell you what we think he wants :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:40): can u help me the to get a idea about the action flow.  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:40): yes, i can try  
kaaloo joined #xwiki at 08:41  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:41): first, the user wants to define a type, right?  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:42): so he gives the name and the space  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:42): you, in the doc manager, must write the code for actually creating that document, as you said before  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:42): that's easy  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:43): ok go on  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:43): at the next step, the user defines the properties of the type  
Enygma` joined #xwiki at 08:43  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:44): this is basically the functionality of the class editor  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:44): mm  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:46): now i think the 3rd tab, 'grid', is useful when your type has beed already defined for some time, and there you have a list of all documents from that type  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:47): ya  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:48): hm... somewhere (maybe in templates?) this thing generates a creation and editing form  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:49): you need to ask for more details  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:49): a clear specification  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:49): template means normal class template  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:51): marta I can't see add another property option in 2nd figure. Is it gonna add by the panel   
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:52): I mean panel in the class editor   
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:52): no, it's right there  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:53): add new property  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:53): Oops sorry  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:53): yes, it's not too visible if you have a small screen  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:54): :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:55): So I have two projects haa ;-)  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:55): well, not exactly  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:56): yes, in the end we'll obtain two cool functionalities  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 08:56  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:56): but the work you do for survey will be much easier after you will have finished the doc manager  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:56): i'd dare to say that 80% of it will be done  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 08:58): mm ya. But how the UI decoration take place. Thats another point we I'm confusing. We only providing the template through the document type.  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 08:59): well, nothing stops you from editing that template after the doc manager generates it  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 09:00): the pont is not to do everything from scratch  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 09:00): \*point  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 09:00): ya "reuse" :)  
kaaloo left at 09:01 ("Leaving.")  
tharindu\_ joined #xwiki at 09:02  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 09:02): sorry, got to go for a while  
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 09:02): talk to you later  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 09:02): ok I better go deep abt it. Got the abstraction. Thanks marta for the help.   
marta\_ - (07/05/2009 09:03): you're welcome  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (07/05/2009 09:03): hav a nice day :)
